Package ch.epfl.cs107.play.game.actor

Interface Actor

All Superinterfaces:
Acoustics, Graphics, Positionable, Updatable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AIPlayer, AreaEntity, Background, CellMouseIndicator, CollectableAreaEntity, DraggableAreaEntity, Entity, Foreground, GraphicsEntity, Grid, ICWarsActor, ICWarsPlayer, MovableAreaEntity, Path, RealPlayer, Soldier, Tank, Text, Unit
public interface Actor extends Updatable, Graphics, Acoustics, Positionable
Top game object, which is directly managed by the game. Smaller components and helpers are usually owned by actors themselves.
